articles.title: Jacquie Aiche, the California Girl of Jewelry Design
articles.description: Laid-back styles with a hippie-deluxe edge have brought attention to Ms. Aiche’s Los Angeles brand.
articles.content: The pieces are in the fine jewelry range: that bra, part of the brand’s permanent collection, is more than $5,000, and a slender bracelet with just over a carat of pavé diamonds is $7,500. Single stud earrings start at around $300, and a thin, textured gold b… [+1473 chars]

articles.author: Rhett Allain
articles.title: Fall Is Here! Time to Learn the Physics of... Falling
articles.description: Stuff is constantly falling—off tables, out of bags, from the sky. Let's explore the science of all things tumbling downward.
articles.content: Take a pencil, stretch out your arm and let go. We all know that the pencil will fall. OK, but what about dropping a bowling ball ? Is that the same thing? No wait! How about a watermelon dropped off a tall building? Why would you do that? I would do it to se… [+13547 chars]

articles.title: The First Time: Paul Scheer: The First Time I Got In a Bar Fight
articles.description: We wanted to be the cool parents who bring their kids to bars and on vacations. So we did!
articles.content: “Oh, yeah?” Wait! What? That was the best I could come up with!? I could have said, “Lenny Kravitz called, he wants his scarf back” or “Did it hurt when you finished last in a Pitbull look-alike contest?” But no, all I said was, “Oh, yeah?” Unfazed by my cutt… [+1175 chars]

articles.author: PETE WELLS
articles.title: Restaurant Review: For Fans of Iran’s Sophisticated Cuisine, a Reason to Cheer
articles.description: Persian restaurants are rare in New York, but Sofreh has come to Brooklyn with fresh herbs, barberries and an ancient rosewater-lime sorbet.
articles.content: It’s an article of faith for chefs in the city that any dish can be improved by putting a poached egg on it. I’m not so sure that Sofreh’s smoked eggplant halves with their sweet, garlic-drenched tomato sauce need one, though. Is the watermelon feta salad fam… [+2096 chars]

articles.title: WATCH Boris Johnson being mocked by Kenyan president (VIDEO)
articles.description: Boris Johnson found himself the butt of a joke when the President of Kenya seemed to forget his name, referring to him simply as the “bicycle guy” during a press conference alongside his British counterpart Theresa May. Read Full Article at RT.com
articles.content: Speaking in Nairobi, Kenya’s leader Uhuru Kenyatta, referring to previous trips by British dignitaries, said: “Last year, if you recall the foreign secretary then, Boris… erm… Boris… Boris Johnson… the bicycle guy was here.” The remark drew a smile from May, … [+875 chars]
